name: ColoredCirclces
description:
-In this game you control a centered circle by changing its color, if you catch the small circles with the correct color you gain points and energy which can be used to unlock special skills, however, if you fail to get the correct color you lose health.

-It's my first game, so although it doesn't look like the best but kinda of proud of it.

-For the next update, skins and backgrounds will be added for the game.

-It's still in development, so please provide me with any feedback, that'll help a lot.
